      Method called by a client to flip or play his initial card.
      Parameters:
      nickname - client's nickname
      jsonInitialCardEvent - flip or play
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      index - objective card choice (index)

      void flipCard(String nickname, int index) throws RemoteException
      Method called by a client to flip his hand card.

      nickname - client's nickname
      index - index of the hand card
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • playCard

      void playCard(String nickname, int index, int x, int y) throws RemoteException
      Method called by a client to play his hand card.
      Parameters:
      nickname - client's nickname
      index - index of the hand card
      x - coordinate x of his play area
      y - coordinate y of his play area
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(String nickname, String jsonDrawCardEvent) throws RemoteException
      Method called by a client to draw a card.
      Parameters:
      nickname - client's nickname
      jsonDrawCardEvent - card to draw
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - when it's not his turn
      NotYourDrawTurnStatusException - when he has to play a card first
      RemoteException

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String nickname, String receiver, String content) throws RemoteException
      Method called by a client to send a message in the game's chat
      Parameters:
      nickname - client's nickname sender
      receiver - receiver (null if it's a global message)
      content - message content
      Throws:
      RemoteException
